question: As per the new order of Finance Ministry, all new schemes that have been approved will remain suspended till which date?
explanation:
As per the recent notification of the Department of Expenditure, Ministry of Finance, all other Ministries and their departments are asked to not initiate any new scheme in the current financial year.
The step has been taken to efficiently use the resources amidst the Cocid-19 crisis in the country. However, this order excludes the proposals announced under the Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package, the Aatmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan package and any other special package. The schemes that have been approved will remain suspended till March 31, 2021.
